name: The Copywriter
description: An easy-drinking Irish whiskey cocktail from Steven Weiss of Craftbar in NYC.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Irish whiskey, such as Jameson
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: For the Honey Syrup: Stir together hot water and honey until honey dissolves.

For Each Cocktail: Add whiskey, lemon, sweet vermouth, and honey syrup to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with seltzer and garnish with a lemon twist.
